statements: SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT contact_number, name FROM customer_info WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM customer_info ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info ORDER BY name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customer_info WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, contact_number FROM customer_info WHERE name LIKE '%John%' OR address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY contact_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT name, contact_number FROM customer_info WHERE address NOT LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY name ASC, contact_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT name, address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, address, contact_number FROM customer_information ORDER BY name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM travel_insurance WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT insurance_id, coverage_type FROM travel_insurance WHERE coverage_type = 'Medical';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT name, address FROM customer_information WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT customer_id, coverage_type FROM travel_insurance WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT address FROM customer_information WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT full_name, address FROM Customers ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, address FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, order_date FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2;

SELECT Customers.full_name, SUM(Payments.payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Payments ON Orders.order_id = Payments.order_id GROUP BY Customers.full_name ORDER BY total_payments DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, start_date, end_date FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE policy_id = 2 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE claim_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT policy_name, start_date, end_date FROM Policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price >= 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address, phone_number, order_date, total_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC;
